channel.title: Python on Anna Scholtz
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Anna Scholtz

item.title: ISC Student Cluster Competition 2015
item.description:
• Member of Team Chemnitz
  • 2nd place in category “Highest Linpack”
  • Responsible for preparing and optimizing the application PyFR and the High-Performance Linpack Benchmark

item.title: Volunteer at the Chemnitzer StudentenNetz (CSN)
item.description:
• Student initiative to administrate and maintain the internet connection in the dormitories on the TU Chemnitz campus
  • Responsible for software development
  • Maintenance and extension work
  • Second-level user support
